description.@en: Through the work of Clavis Maioris Sapientiae, we find the Art of making acid in all its mundane and warlike forms . . .

effect.@en:
Create Acid Bomb: The more potent the bomb is, the more the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Add +0 Total Damage: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Add +3 Total Damage: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Add +6 Total Damage: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of bombs for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One bomb

[IB] 7 to 12: Two bombs

[IB] 13+: Three bombs

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory and Alkali. Acid Bombs can be found in Article 5: Wares & Weapons.
